feed.title: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org
feed.subtitle: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org on GitHub

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle has Incorrect Default Permissions
entry.content:
In Moodle, insufficient capability checks meant message deletions were not limited to the current user.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-36397
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=424803
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-2wmj-8mqg-r9q8

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle Cross-site Scripting vulnerability
entry.content:
In Moodle, ID numbers displayed in the web service token list required additional sanitizing to prevent a stored XSS risk.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-36398
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=424804
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-786g-xv8v-9h93

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle has Incorrect Default Permissions
entry.content:
In Moodle, insufficient capability checks made it possible to remove other users' calendar URL subscriptions.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-36400
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=424806
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-35wf-3wq2-r3hx

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle vulnerable to Stored Cross-site Scripting
entry.content:
In Moodle, ID numbers exported in HTML data formats required additional sanitizing to prevent a local stored XSS risk.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-36401
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=424807
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-g6h6-4fp6-w33w

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle Improper Input Validation vulnerability
entry.content:
In affected versions of Moodle, users' names require additional sanitizing in the account confirmation email, to prevent a self-registration phishing risk. This issue has been patched in versions 3.9.8, 3.10.5 and 3.11.1.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-36402
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=424808
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-gv8f-43pg-c5qw

entry.content:

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle has a Hidden Functionality vulnerability
entry.content:
In Moodle, in some circumstances, email notifications of messages could have the link back to the original message hidden by HTML, which may pose a phishing risk.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-36403
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=424809
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-j9cw-5cpj-9qj5

entry.title: [craftcms/cms] Craft CMS Stored Cross-site Scripting Injection Vulnerability
entry.content:
Summary

When you insert a payload inside a label name or instruction of an entry type, an XSS happens in the quick post widget on the admin dashboard.

PoC

Complete instructions, including specific configuration details, to reproduce the vulnerability.

Impact

Tested with the free version of Craft CMS 4.3.6.1

References

  • https://github.com/craftcms/cms/security/advisories/GHSA-qcrj-6ffc-v7hq
  • https://github.com/craftcms/cms/blob/develop/CHANGELOG.md#437---2023-02-03
  • https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/53917092/215604129-d5b75608-5a24-4eb3-906f-55b192310298.mp4
  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-23927
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-qcrj-6ffc-v7hq

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle SQL Injection vulnerability
entry.content:
In Moodle, an SQL injection risk was identified in the library fetching a user's recent courses.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-36393
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=424798
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-f46j-r7q3-6cm2

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle SQL Injection vulnerability
entry.content:
In Moodle, an SQL injection risk was identified in the library fetching a user's recent courses.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-36393
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=424798
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-f46j-r7q3-6cm2
